/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves forming a natural canopy overhead. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. In the distance, a crane stands tall, hinting at the ongoing development and progress in the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, completing the urban landscape.
